description: I'm in the main lobby, the smoke is heavy and fires are burning all around me, I need to tread carefully.
westDescription: It looks like there's an Elevator here but it looks busted so I can't go that way.
southDescription: That's the front door but it's covered with a mountain of debris. Can't go this way either.
northDescription: A lot of fire this way but I should have enough room to get up the stairs to the second floor.
eastDescription: I can see a kitchen but it's covered by a wall of fire, looks like I can't go that way.
name: lobby

description: I'm on the second floor staircase, the smoke is heavier up here.
westDescription: Hard to see, but it looks like I can go this way to some of the rooms.
southDescription: This way would take me back to the lobby
northDescription: Looks like I can keep going up, the smoke is heavy but I should be able to manage.
eastDescription: I see a window, it's too high up for me to escape. Looking outside all I see are fires all around the city, how could this happen?
name: Second Floor Staircase

description: Looks like I made it to the third floor staircase. It just gets worse and worse the higher that I go.
westDescription: Looks like I can manage to get to the rooms this way but I'd have to step over these dead bodies.... God please.
southDescription: This would take me back to the second floor
northDescription: Did I just here gun shots? Could've just been my imagination... Either way I have to go this way to get to the roof.
eastDescription: The whole wall collapsed, I couldn't make my way down if I tried.
name: Third Floor Staircase

description: I'm on the the fourth floor staircase. If I keep going I can make my way to the roof.
westDescription: There's a lot of fire going this way but I should be able to make it to the roof stairway.
southDescription: This would take me back down to the third floor.
northDescription: There's no more stairs to go up, but it looks like I can go West.
eastDescription: I can't go this way. There is nothing but a wall here.
name: Fourth Floor Staircase

description: Looks like I'm in room 200, things are broken and thrown everywhere, better keep moving.
westDescription: If I head west I can go to room 205.
southDescription: Nothing but a broken bookshelf here, nowhere I can go here.
northDescription: This wall is engulfed in flames, there's no way to go.
eastDescription: This way will take me back to the second floor staircase.
name: Room 200

description: Made it to Room 300 looks exactly the same as Room 200. Hopefully the people who lived here made it out.
westDescription: If I keep going this way I can get to another room.
southDescription: Can't go this way, it's just a wall.
northDescription: Looks like one of the support beams fell and there's fire covering this way. I have to go another way.
eastDescription: This will take me back to the third floor staircase.
name: Room 300

description: Made it to Room 410, I should be able to get to the roof if I keep going.
westDescription: If I go this way, I can get to the Roof Staircase, I'm almost there!
southDescription: Flames are blocking my way if I tried going this way.
northDescription: A bunch of broken items like the rest of the rooms.
eastDescription: If I go back this way it'll take me to the Fourth Floor Staircase.
name: Room 410

description: Made it to room 205. This room appears to be almost untouched by the fire.
westDescription: It's a window, but it's too high up to escape.
southDescription: A bookshelf is in the way of this. It's too heavy for me to move in my state
northDescription: It looks like this way is barricaded so I can't get through.
eastDescription: This will take me back to Room 200
name: Room 205

description: I'm in Room 310. This was basically untouched by the fire as well.
westDescription: Nothing but a wall here, I see explosions in the far distance.
southDescription: A wall is here, can't go this way.
northDescription: There's a bed here but there is nowhere to go.
eastDescription: If I go back this way I will go back to room 300
name: Room 310

description: Made it to the Roof Staircase! If I keep going this way I can get to the helicopter!
westDescription: Theres nothing here, I need to get to the roof!
southDescription: Nothing here, I gotta get to the roof.
northDescription: If I head this way I can get to the roof!
eastDescription: If I go back this way I'll go back to Room 410, I should definitely get to the roof!
name: Roof Staircase
